div.p: FINALLY, HONOLULU, MAY TENTH, MORE ACTION ON BILLO’REILLY.COM.
FINALLY, THE TIP OF THE DAY COMING FROM STEPHANIE JOHNSON
WHO LIVES IN CALIFORNIA. BILL, I’M A LONG-TIME FACTOR
VIEWER WHO NEVER HAD MUCH USE FOR THE TIP OF THE DAY.
BUT I DID TAKE YOUR ADVICE AND WROTE A NOTE TO A COUPLE WHO WAS
LIKE FAMILY TO ME. IT WAS GREATLY RECEIVED.
AND THESE DAYS, E-MAILING OR TEXTING A HANDWRITTEN NOTE ON
GENUINE PAPER? IT WILL ELEVATE YOU.
IF A PERSON IS ELDERLY, DROP THEM A NOTE.
IT IS A KIND THING TO DO FOR YOU ON THE PATHWAY TO HEAVEN.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. AND THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
CHECK OUT THE FACTOR WEBSITE DIFFERENT FROM BILL
